1.10.name: wordpress/e-paper
1.10.description:
With E-Paper-plugin you can easily integrate your e-paper (created with FlipViewer Xpress) into your WordPress powered website.

The conversion is pretty simple. You just have to load a pdf file into FlipViewer Xpress, create the e-paper-folder and upload it via this plugin into your WordPress site.

It's a great solution for publishers who want to make their publications available as a web version.

Features

  • Provides a custom post type 'epaper' with title, author, excerpt, categories, tags, thumbnail and custom-fields
  • Localized for English and German
  • Content of epaper can be stored page-wise for searching-purpose
  • Full Relevanssi Support: Full-text search through all your e-paper using Relevanssi. Search results hit the e-paper page where the phrase occured.
  • Optimized for
